cab.content: SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - HOOU - 19th SEPTEMBER, 1918.1. V/ESTERN FRONT. "British ProntoThere is no change on the ST. QUENTIN "battle front. The number of prisoners reported so far is 8,000 and about 50 guns have been taken-*A strong enemy attack between GOUZEAU COURT and HAVRINCOURT yesterday was completely repulsed and we took about 150. prisoners *On the remainder of the British front there is nothinc to report. French Front *Ithe French have captured the village of CONTESCOURT. Other-wise there is no change on the French front. 2* ITALIAN AID MACEDONIAN FRONTS.South-west of ST. QUENTIN, after heavy fighting,Nothing to report.General Staff, Far Office,19th September,, 1918.Issued at 12.30 p.nu
